paper_abstract: Time is considered as an important factor in modeling and operation of dynamic systems However few studies have considered time factor in modeling and inference of fuzzy cognitive maps (FCMs) besides no studies have dealt with time delay in learning of FCMs Therefore we propose a learning rule for temporal FCMs involving post and pre delay time by extending Oja s learning rule We show the effectiveness of the proposed rule through simulations which solve a time delayed chemical plant control problem.
paper_title: Learning Rule for Time Delay in Fuzzy Cognitive Maps
